meanings.definition: Having a strong or prominent chest
meanings.sent1: He is the chestier of the two brothers.
meanings.sent2: The superhero had a chestier physique than the villain.
meanings.sent3: The chestier man in the gym challenged everyone to a push-up contest.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence made her seem even chestier than usual.
meanings.sent5: The chestier boxer easily won the match with his powerful punches.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive pride or arrogance in one's chest
meanings.sent1: She walked with a chestier attitude after winning the award.
meanings.sent2: His chestier behavior alienated his friends.
meanings.sent3: The chestier student boasted about his grades to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The chestier peacock strutted around the garden, showing off its feathers.
meanings.sent5: The chestier politician believed he was above everyone else in the room.

meanings.sent1: She felt chestier after completing her workout routine.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber was chestier than he had ever been before.
meanings.sent3: The chestier dog proudly wagged its tail after fetching the ball.
meanings.sent4: The chestier tree stood tall among the others in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The chestier cloud loomed overhead, casting a shadow on the valley.
